CustomField.description: Percentage completion toward achieving the target attendance for this event.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL( Average_No_Show_Rate__c ) = TRUE, "Avg No Show Not Set", IF(ISNULL(Targeted_Registration__c) = TRUE, "Target Not Set", IF( Attendee_Registrations_Formula__c / (Targeted_Registration__c+(Targeted_Registration__c*Average_No_Show_Rate__c)) >= 1, "Goal Achieved!", TEXT( ROUND(100 * ( Attendee_Registrations_Formula__c / (Targeted_Registration__c+(Targeted_Registration__c*Average_No_Show_Rate__c))),1)) &"% Completed")))
CustomField.label: Reg Target Progress
